name: Kerehaklu Estate - Peaberries
description: This special two-pack( 125 gms each) , crafted in partnership with Kerehaklu Estate, features our favourite mutation, a Peaberry. Coffee cherries usually hold two seeds but about 5-10% of the time, just one seed grows inside the cherry. This is a Peaberry. Small, round, and denser than regular coffee beans, it boasts a unique flavour profile, with a deeper sweetness and a brighter acidity. Carefully isolated by Pranoy, Ajoy, and team at the farm, the Peaberries that lent to the creation of this pack were processed in two distinct ways: - Washed (Aerobic Sequential) This lot underwent a sequential aerobic fermentation, where Peaberries were submerged in water for an extended period, creating an oxygen-rich environment that brought out complexity, clarity, and bright acidity. Roasted light, these make for a cup with the aroma of brown sugar and citrus, and a juicy mouthfeel that opens into notes of mosambi, toffee, and green grape. The aftertaste is sweet and reminds of ripe mosambis. Natural (Anoxic) Fermented in an oxygen-free environment, the coffee cherries in this lot experienced a slower, more complex fermentation, since the microbes had more time to break down the sugars present, and produce a wider range of aromatic compounds. The result is a rich, fruity flavour profile with a deep body and balance. Roasted light, these make for a cup with the aroma of red grape and dark cherries, and a creamy mouthfeel revealing notes of orange, red grape, and red apple. Punctuating each sip is a lingering aftertaste of red apple. We recommend brewing these coffees black as a Pour Over or using an AeroPress. Recommended Resting Period: 15 Days Note: This coffee pack is a special release with limited availability and, therefore, cannot be included in our Mixed Bag subscription.

name: MSP Micro Lot Blend
description: A melting pot of micro-climates where some of India’s finest coffee has thrived since 1920, MSP Coffee is a group of seven estates in Yercaud, including the three that lend to this blend. From achieving a surprisingly sweet cup after fermenting coffee with a local variety of bitter lemons to seeing the tail end of a 1000-hour ferment, the group exemplifies how curiosity lies at the heart of their work. The micro lots we picked for this blend come from Bison Valley Estate, Stanmore Estate, and Orchardale Estate and bear this very spirit. The first lot was washed and fermented with melon extract, with the processing imparting a unique sweetness. The second underwent triple fermentation: first as whole cherries, then after depulping, and finally after washing. This process uniquely combined quick dry fermentation and long anaerobic fermentation with watermelon, developing complexity. The third coffee was processed using the natural method, with cherries dried intact, allowing the fruit to shape its character. Roasted medium, the blend has a fruity and punchy flavour profile with notes of cherry, dark chocolate, and wild berry, followed by a rich, lingering aftertaste of chocolate. This blend works well black as well as with milk and lends itself nicely to most brewing methods including espresso, Pour Over, Moka Pot, French Press, AeroPress, and Cold Brew. Recommended Resting Period: 7 Days
tags: estate:The micro lots we picked for this blend come from Bison Valley

name: Attikan Estate
description: Sweet with fruity overtones and balanced acidity, Attikan Estate is the darkest of our standard medium roasts and is perfect to brew an espresso with. It boasts of a bold and fruity profile, rounded off with a hint of nuttiness. Contains our most-loved and highest scoring coffees. these coffee capsules are made using aluminium, that is 100% recyclable. Keeps freshness and flavour intact. Easy to use and perfect for quick, fuss-free brewing. These coffee capsules are compatible with any machine that works with Nespresso®️* Original Line coffee pods. We recommended using these for a single shot of espresso and espresso-style beverages. Tastes great when consumed black or used in milk-based beverages. Disclaimer:- Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Nespresso®. Nespresso® is a registered trademark of Societe des Produits Nestlé S.A.

name: Origin Unhurried: Yercaud Pack
description: In the spirit of slow travel, welcome to a journey through India's coffee-growing regions, where coffee cherries ripen under the shade of tall trees, centuries-old crafts continue to thrive in skilled hands, and expressions of heritage endure and evolve. For the third destination, we bring you three 75g packs of coffee from Yercaud, a picturesque hill station dotted with streams and valleys, where coffee has been cultivated since 1820. The selection includes: Riverdale Estate - White Rose, an experimental light roast fermented with rose petals, brewing cups with notes of blood orange, passion fruit, and pomegranate. Hidden Falls Estate, a natural light roast with a fruity and punchy flavour profile, and notes of mango, mulberry, and guava. Gowri Estate, a natural medium roast with notes of mulberry, red plum, and red grape. The pack also includes stories of local craft, culture, and community, offering an opportunity to establish a deeper connection with your brews. Recommended Resting Period: Gowri Estate: 8 days Hidden Falls Estate: 15 days Riverdale Estate - White Rose: 15 days Wait for this short duration to enjoy optimal flavours. Resting allows coffee to degas after roasting, resulting in a well-balanced and flavourful brew. Note: This coffee pack is a special release with limited availability and, therefore, cannot be included in our Mixed Bag subscription.

name: Riverdale Estate - White Rose
description: Fermented with rose petals, this layered light roast perfectly embodies why Riverdale Estate is a pioneer in experimental processing. Only the ripest cherries, hand-picked from the higher-altitude blocks of the farm, where the fruit matures slowly and develops an enhanced sweetness, were used. Once harvested, the cherries underwent a triple wash with natural spring water to remove impurities, followed by a floating process to eliminate underdeveloped beans. During fermentation, rose petals were introduced, setting up the stage for complexity in the cup. After fermentation, the cherries were slow-dried on raised beds for up to 30 days, allowing for even drying. Finally, the coffee was hulled at the estate’s dry mill, where any defective beans were eliminated before being sent to our roastery. In the cup, you’ll experience bright notes of blood orange, passion fruit, and pomegranate, complemented by a creamy mouthfeel and a lingering sweetness. We recommend brewing it black using an AeroPress or as a Pour Over. Note: This coffee is a special release with limited availability and, therefore, cannot be included in our Mixed Bag subscription.

estate:the coffee was hulled at the

name: Raxidi Estate - Natural
description: Our partnership with Raxidi Estate, a coffee farm run by three generations of the Lobo family since the 1950s, begins with an experimental anaerobic natural. To shape this micro lot into a cup with remarkable depth, handpicked coffee cherries were washed and placed in stainless steel containers, where they underwent a 20-hour anaerobic fermentation. Once fermented, the cherries were carefully dried on raised beds for 21 days, with temperature and humidity carefully monitored. Roasted light, the resulting brew opens with the aroma of prunes and black raisin, and notes of plum, raspberry, and mosambi. The mouthfeel is smooth and syrupy with a medium body, and finishing each sip is the sweet aftertaste of plum. Best enjoyed black, we recommend brewing this coffee using an AeroPress, or as a Pour Over.

name: Salawara Estate - Lot 1418
description: From a partner farm that prides itself on sustainable irrigation practices, and whose name translates to "a string of blessings", here's a versatile coffee with a balanced flavour profile. Processed using the honey sun-dried method, this medium roast has an aroma that hints at berries and honey. The lush, creamy mouthfeel reveals notes of peach, pomelo, and honey, while a light aftertaste of mosambi lingers. With low bitterness and a harmonious balance of sweetness and acidity, it makes for a great cup for diverse palates. Our roasters recommend brewing it as an espresso, a Pour Over, or using an AeroPress. It works well black as well as in milk-based recipes.

name: Dhak Blend 250g + Channi
description: Rich Dark Chocolate, Cocoa, and Fruit Jam Notes: This dark roast offers a bold, layered profile with deep dark chocolate and cocoa flavours, complemented by a hint of fruit jam for a unique, indulgent taste. Best Enjoyed with Milk: Perfectly balanced and smooth with milk, this coffee creates a full-bodied, creamy cup that’s satisfying and rich. Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: This combo comes with a stainless steel channi (filter), making it easy to brew a smooth, grit-free cup at home—ideal for coffee lovers and as a thoughtful gift option. Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Effortless Brewing: The Dhak Blend is recommended for espresso-based drinks as well as manual methods like Moka Pot and French Press. With the channi, you can also enjoy a well-filtered, bold cup quickly and easily. Description: Indulge in the rich, bold flavours of our Dhak Blend, where dark chocolate, cocoa, and a touch of fruit jam come together to create a memorable coffee experience. Ideal for espresso and manual brews, this dark roast can also be easily prepared with the channi, delivering a smooth, satisfying cup every time.

name: French Roast 250g + Channi
description: Bold Cocoa and Bittersweet Flavours: This dark roast delivers a robust, intense profile with deep cocoa notes and a bittersweet finish, creating a rich, satisfying coffee experience. Best Enjoyed with Milk: Perfectly bold and smooth with milk, this coffee provides a creamy, full-bodied cup with every brew. Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: This combo includes a stainless steel channi (filter) to make brewing at home simple and mess-free, giving you a well-filtered cup each time—perfect for everyday enjoyment or as a thoughtful gift. Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Easy Brewing: Ideal for espresso or manual brewing methods like French Press or Manual Grinder. With the channi, you can also brew a strong, smooth cup effortlessly at home. Description: Discover the bold, bittersweet taste of our French Roast, a dark roast coffee designed to be enjoyed with milk for a creamy, full-bodied experience. Perfect for espresso and manual brewing, this coffee can also be easily brewed with the channi, ensuring a smooth, flavourful cup every time

name: Silver Oak 250g + Channi
description: Smooth Hazelnut, Honey, and Grape Notes: This medium roast blend offers a refined balance of flavours, with a touch of hazelnut, natural honey sweetness, and a subtle hint of grapes for a truly unique taste. Best Paired with Milk: Perfectly smooth and creamy with milk, this coffee shines in espresso-based drinks, adding depth and richness to your cup. Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: The stainless steel channi (filter) in this combo makes it easy to prepare a perfectly filtered cup, adding convenience to your coffee ritual and making it a thoughtful gift for coffee lovers. Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Easy Brewing: This blend is ideal for espresso and manual brews, whether you prefer AeroPress, Pour Over, or even a refreshing cold brew. With the channi, you can effortlessly enjoy a smooth, flavourful cup at home. Description: Discover the layered taste of Silver Oak Café Blend, where each sip brings notes of hazelnut, honey, and grapes. Designed to pair beautifully with milk, this medium roast works well in espresso-based drinks and manual brews, and can be easily brewed with the channi for a rich coffee experience.

name: Vienna Roast 250g + Channi
description: Bold Cocoa, Oaky, and Bittersweet Flavours: This dark roast coffee delivers a rich profile with deep cocoa notes, a hint of oak, and a perfectly balanced bittersweet finish. Best Enjoyed with Milk: Smooth and robust, this coffee is best savoured with milk, making for a creamy, indulgent cup with every brew. Includes a Stainless Steel Channi: Paired with a stainless steel channi (filter), this combo makes it simple to prepare a perfectly filtered cup at home, ideal for coffee enthusiasts and as a thoughtful gift. Perfect for Espresso & Manual Brewing—Channi-Friendly Too: Crafted to be brewed as an espresso or with manual methods like Moka Pot, French Press, or South Indian Filter. Easily prepared with the included channi, it’s convenient to brew a strong, satisfying coffee whenever you need. Description: Savour the bold, bittersweet flavours of our Vienna Roast, where cocoa richness and oaky undertones create an indulgent taste experience. Best enjoyed with milk, this coffee is adaptable for various manual brewing methods, including a quick, smooth channi brew at home.

name: Attikan Estate 250g + Channi
description: Rich Dark Chocolate, Figs, and Roasted Almond Notes: This medium-dark roast coffee offers a smooth yet bold flavour profile, with dark chocolate, figs, and roasted almonds that give every sip a warm, layered richness. Perfect Black or With Milk: Enjoy the flexibility of this coffee—it’s delicious both as a black coffee or with milk, giving you a chocolatey and nutty cup every time. Includes a Stainless Steel Channi: This combo comes with a stainless steel channi (filter), making it easy to enjoy a smooth cup anytime you want. Perfect for at-home brewing or gifting to a coffee lover. Ideal for Manual Brewing and Channi-Friendly: This versatile coffee shines in a variety of manual brewing methods, from Moka Pot and South Indian Filter to AeroPress. Easily brewed with the included channi, it’s convenient for a quick, indulgent cup at home. Description: Indulge in the nuanced flavours of Attikan Estate coffee, where each sip reveals layers of dark chocolate and fig sweetness with subtle nutty notes of almond. This versatile coffee can be enjoyed black or with milk, and pairs well with manual brewing methods—including a quick, easy channi brew.
tags: estate:Indulge in the nuanced flavours of Attikan

name: Riverdale Estate – Gesha Natural
description: We’re excited to bring back Nano-X, our series of experiments created by a handful of visionary producers and creative Blue Tokai roasters, with the prized Gesha from Riverdale Estate. The Gesha variety is considered among the most sought-after, most expensive, and highest-scoring coffees which tend to score 90 points and above, in any part of the world. It originally hails from Ethiopia’s Gori Gesha Forest and was responsible for completely changing the world’s coffee landscape. Geshas are very hard to come across, and since last year, Prakashan and his team have been among the few ensuring a homegrown Gesha flourishes at Riverdale Estate. The coffee cherries he and his team harvested this year were processed by performing carbonic maceration in barrels, an experimental processing technique in which ripe coffee cherries are fermented in a CO2-rich, anaerobic environment. Roasted light, the result is an exceptional lot, with the pleasant aroma of jasmine and oranges, and a multitude of delicate floral and fruity notes that evolve as the brew cools. Tasting Notes: Cantaloupe, Pomegranate, Bergamot, Jasmine Roast Level: Light About the Farm and Producer Nestled in the Shevaroy Hills of Tamil Nadu, Riverdale Estate has been managed by three generations since 1920. Its producer, Prakashan Balaraman, is one of the front-runners for experimental processing in India and he believes that the secret to good coffee begins with the crop. He’s been challenging traditional growing and processing practices and has previously processed coffees for us where interesting elements like papaya, pineapple and champagne yeast were used. About the Roaster Our roasting team was very excited to work with a Gesha for the 2nd year, and one of our seasoned roasters, Shreyas, fine-tuned its roast profile. He appreciates how it makes for a clean, complex cup with a bouquet of delicate fruity notes, with floral notes standing out. Please Note: This is a special release available in limited quantities. Due to the exclusive nature of this coffee, no replacements or refunds will be offered. Every batch has been carefully cupped and approved by our expert roasters to ensure the highest quality. We recommend enjoying this coffee between 20 and 30 days post-roast, ideally after two weeks, for the best flavor experience.
tags: estate:with the prized Gesha from Riverdale

The Silver Oak Blend is an extremely versatile choice that has a balanced flavour profile and works really well as an espresso. Contains some of our most-loved and highest scoring coffees. Made using aluminium, that is 100% recyclable. Keeps freshness and flavour intact. Easy to use and perfect for quick, fuss-free brewing. Its heavy cocoa body leaves a smooth lingering aftertaste and makes for a bold, well-rounded cup of coffee. Contains some of our most-loved and highest scoring coffees. Made using aluminium, that is 100% recyclable. Keeps freshness and flavour intact. Easy to use and perfect for quick, fuss-free brewing. name: Cold Brew Bags - Bold
description: Chocolatey + Robust Our Cold Brew Bold is a dark roast perfect for those who enjoy a robust kick in their coffee and prefer low acidity. This blend has a nutty flavour profile with notes of dark chocolate and roasted nuts. Perfect for milky drinks. Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Seethargundu Estate | Light Roast - Easy Pour
description: If you like your coffee light, fruity and complex in flavours, this one could be your next favourite. With a clean and crisp body, you'll be treated to aromas of jaggery and sugarcane, a syrupy mouthfeel, and a smooth, velvety texture, followed by a lingering aftertaste of refreshing citrus. Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pours.

name: Monsoon Malabar | Medium-Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description: Nutty + Earthy If you like your coffee dark, but not too much, our Monsoon Malabar AA is perfect for you! With earthy notes, this big-bodied coffee finishes nutty with minimal acidity and notes of spice. Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Mixed | Light to Dark Roasts - Easy Pour
description: Brewing made easy! Our mixed bag contains a range of single-estate coffees of different roast levels, so you can try them all. Seethargundu Estate is a light roast that offers a clean, crisp body, sweet aromas and a refreshing citrusy aftertaste, while Vienna is a dark roast that’s bitter and bold. Thogarihunkal Estate is a fruity medium roast and Attikan Estate is medium-dark that packs a nutty, chocolatey punch, Jacaranda Blend is a sweet, and chocolatey medium-dark roast. Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Vienna | Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description: Bold + Strong Oaky, with overtones of cocoa and a hint of bitterness, this smooth dark roast is a classic. Every cup is heavy-bodied with low acidity and is perfect for those who love the sharp, bold taste of coffee! Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Orange Mint
description: Zesty and refreshing coffee in a can, this cold brew brings out notes of citrus and mint in every sip. Roasted with precision for a unique flavour, it has balanced acidity and low bitterness. Like all our cold brews, it uses 100% arabica beans, sourced directly from India’s best farms. How it’s brewed: Specialty-grade Arabica coffee is steeped for 18 hours to bring out a zesty and refreshing flavour. Ingredients: Filtered Water (85.10%), 100% Arabica Coffee (12.50%), Orange Mint Syrup (2.4%) Nutritional Values (per 100ml): Energy 29.44kcal, Carbs 6.84g, Natural Sugar 1.71g, Protein 0.52g, Total Fat 0g, Cholesterol 0mg, Sodium 1.62mg

name: French Roast | Very Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description: Cocoa + Bittersweet Savour the bittersweet and cocoa notes of our darkest roast. If you like your coffee bittersweet and with minimal acidity, our French Roast is perfect for you! Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Jacaranda Blend | Medium Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description: Chocolatey + Sweet With low acidity and a nutty flavour profile, the chocolatey and sweet flavours of our Jacaranda Blend tastes wonderful black or with a dash of milk. This blend is made from naturally processed Arabica from Gowri Estate, washed Arabica from Baarbara Estate and Robusta from Kerehaklu Estate. Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes. Click here to read more about Gowri Estate. Click here to read more about Baarbara Estate. Click here to read more about Kerehaklu Estate.

name: Classic Light
description: Our signature Classic Light cold brew brings out a playful fruity flavour, and has been a hit with light roast drinkers since it was launched across our cafes years ago. Recommended for those who enjoy their coffee black. All our cold brews use 100% Arabica coffee beans, are sourced directly from India’s best farms and are roasted with precision for a unique flavour. Ingredients: Filtered water, 100% Arabica coffee Nutritional Values (per 100ml): Energy 12 cal, Carbs 1.2g, Natural Sugar 1.0g, Protein 0.9g, Total Fat 0.4g Each can is 250ml. This product contains no added sugars. You can purchase this as a pack of 2 or 6. Save 12% when you purchase a pack of 6!

name: Cold Brew Bags - Light Blend
description: Fruity + Refreshing If you enjoy a fruity flavour profile, this one’s for you. Our Cold Brew Light is a refreshing blend that shines with fruity notes of berry and subtle hints of white chocolate, best consumed black. Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Cold Brew Bags - Kalledeverapura
description: Rich + Smooth This single estate Cold Brew option is a medium roast sourced from one of our oldest farm partners, Kalledevarapura Estate, situated in the hills of Chikmagalur. With beautiful notes of stone fruit and toffee, this blend can be enjoyed black or with milk. Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Thogarihunkal Estate | Medium Roast - Easy Pour
description: Fruity + Medium Bodied We love the tasting notes of apricot, blueberry and cashew that shine through in this honey sun-dried, medium roast. Thogarihunkal Estate’s fruity notes and medium body are perfect for when you need a quick, delicious pick-me-up! Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Attikan Estate | Medium-Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description: Nutty + Chocolatey If you like your coffee a little dark, but not too much, this one is perfect for you. It has low acidity and flavour notes of figs, dark chocolate and roasted almonds. The delicious nuttiness of this medium-dark roast hits all the right notes, whether enjoyed with milk or black. Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.
